description.description: Detailed description of the product and its inventory

formats.description: Array of supported creative format IDs - use list_creative_formats to get full format details

items.description: Format ID referencing a format from list_creative_formats

placement_types.description: Array of placement type IDs that this product supports for multi-size handling

items.description: Placement type ID referencing a placement type definition

format_preferences.description: Publisher preferences for format selection and priority

responsive_behavior.description: How this placement handles responsive/multi-size scenarios

supports_responsive.description: Whether this placement can adapt to different viewport sizes

selection_strategy.description: How formats are selected when multiple are available

max_concurrent_formats.description: Maximum number of formats that can be active simultaneously

is_fixed_price.description: Whether this product has fixed pricing (true) or uses auction (false)

cpm.description: Cost per thousand impressions in USD

is_custom.description: Whether this is a custom product

brief_relevance.description: Explanation of why this product matches the brief (only included when brief is provided)
